term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - tailing in chromatography
term.title: tailing

item.text: Asymmetry of a peak such that, relative to the baseline, the front is steeper than the rear. In paper chromatography and in thin-layer chromatography, the distortion of a zone showing a diffuse region behind the zone in the direction of travel.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 819. 'Nomenclature for chromatography (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 837 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365040819)
